game: Norigin is a third person story driven adventure exploration game centred around a son reconnecting with his father through lost memories. Take control of our lost travelling protagonist during his journey of self discovery as you become intertwined in this gripping and emotional origin story. Experience gorgeous levels full of obstacles enemies & breathtaking music.Key FeaturesFor fans of dynamic story driven action adventure gamesA personal intimate story written by a solo developerAn adventure of mystery secrets and ancient wonders

Norigin is a third person story driven adventure exploration game centred around a son reconnecting with his father through lost memories. Take control of our lost travelling protagonist during his journey of self discovery as you become intertwined in this gripping and emotional origin story. Experience gorgeous levels full of obstacles enemies & breathtaking music.Key FeaturesFor fans of dynamic story driven action adventure gamesA personal intimate story written by a solo developerAn adventure of mystery secrets and ancient wonders

Norigin is a third person story driven adventure exploration game centred around a son reconnecting with his father through lost memories. Take control of our lost travelling protagonist during his journey of self discovery as you become intertwined in this gripping and emotional origin story.

Minimum:OS : Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10Processor: x86 x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set supportMemory: 8 GB RAMGraphics: DirectX 11 Compatible Video Card (Intel HD Graphics Not Supported)DirectX: Version 11Storage: 4 GB available space
